channel.title: How do i create a store for a npc i add in,
channel.description:
K, The source i used, frugoo, has a lot of stores already, but editing items is fun but i make many too strong, but i dont wanna forget all of them so i want to hide a store to stock with all of them.
if i add in an npc to wherever the x and y coordinates are, and its original a shop keeper, how do i make it a shop? trade it and itj ust disconnects.
